content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i went out on my front porch to smoke a cig, we don't smoke in our home. i was facing outward towards the main road that we live on here in sheldon, vt. i could only see so much of the sky because of the roof of my front porch. between the roof of my porch and the trees across the road from us i only had 3 ft of sky view. (that was from my perspective from my front porch) as we were standing there talking he was facing me and i was facing the road. all of a sudden i just saw this round glowing ball moving quickly then it disappeared beyond the treeline. i said look! 3 times and by the time he had turned around to see what i was seeing it had already disappeared. to me it looked as if it was falling. there was no tracers, no sounds, just the object. i thought at first that it was some sort of flare or it reminded me of fireworks being shot up in the sky before they actually explode in the air. the thing is, the object was traveling across rather than up and stayed a solid green/blueish glowing color. i came in my house maybe 1 minute after and my clock said that it was 12:55 am. i immediately got on my laptop and e-mailed a person that i know who works for a paranormal investigating team based out of south burlington, vermont. he emailed me back and said that they were on the road coming back from a reported ufo sighting area and he could not believe that i had seen it from my home because him and his team had seen the samething in the sky from essex, vt. essex is about 30 miles from me. his team of investigaters were in separte cars, one car was ahead of him and one was behind him and they all had seen the samething. i am very interested in finding out how many people had actually seen this, or if anyone else reported this to you. it was a great experience i am very anxious to find out what i and others saw. thank you for your time,   danielle benoit, sheldon, vt, 05483 this event occured at 12:50am on sept 20 2009 this form wont except my time. again thank you for your time. contact me with any questions you may have!
content.summary: Veiwed it from my front porch it was a glowing green circle or sphere.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my deck talking with my neibor i heard the sound of a jetliner... as i looked up i saw the plane cruising at an altitude of about six miles (30,000 ft}, it was a clear cloudless day and i could see the wings and the vapor trail clearly...Then came into view much much lower over the tree line on the same trajectory i saw a silver object that looked like an elongated rural gas tank at about two or three thousand feet in altitude ...Just a cylinder moving smoothly ...No wings , no windows,no sound,...It was moving fast but not as fast as the jetliner which i assume at that altitude is around five hundred miles an hour...It was at my best guess twenty feet in diameter and at least one hundred feet in lenth...This was in daylight, not a blimp or anything else i've ever seen. as far as i know , man has'nt made anything that big that can fly that fast without making noise.
content.summary: Sited cylinder shaped object moving over home

content.detailedDescription: Im a truckdriver, i have seen ufo's before, this one was visible for about 15 minutes. started out as a very big bright light, if a full moon was a silver dollar, this was a dime, i could make out that it was triangle in shape, it moved a little bit but mostly stationary, until the thing separated then it was two objects, at this point one stayed still the other moved down below, a long way, then moved to the right, straight across from the stationary one, then it moved directly above the stationary one, at this point they both started to move and then they were gone. i do have photos (phone camara) the pictures dont show what it is but they do show what it is not. i know alot of people saw it because it was there for so long, i told other truck drivers about it on the cb.I was headed east, this appeared to the north.
content.summary: Big, if a full moon is a silver dollar, this was a dime, very bright

content.detailedDescription: While laying in bed at night i heard a low humming almost similiar to a oscilatting motor aproach from the south.  it took almost 5 minutes for it to approach.  once over my house the noise sounded very low altitude.  i was to tired to look outside, but the noise sent chills up my spine.  the noise steadily dissipated over the next five minutes to the north, to what sounded like a perfect linear pathway.  if anyone else reports this same incident i would love to be put in contact with them so i know that i am not going crazy!
content.summary: No visual....Just auditory

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i both saw the same light from two separate points about 2 miles apart.   looking southeast from east wallingford vermont.   saw bright bullet-shaped light with small spray of light below, like a flood light.   flood light effect expanded lowrer, then bright light went out while flood light slowly faded.   duration 1-2 minutes.   object appeared stationary.  much larger than any planet or star except the moon (not visible at that time).
content.summary: Bright cone shaped light with spot light effect below

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling home from hiking in the white mountians of n.H.. we were traveling south on route 93. at approximately mile marker # 91 around campton, n.H., and around 7:55pm we saw off to the south west a brite white cone of light. it was stationery and brite for some # of seconds then all of a sudden it seemed as though whatever was there left and all you had left was a cone of light which slowly disapated. it did not appear that the cone of light was close to the ground,it was up in the sky, and was hard to judge how high it was. our first thoughts were that it was lights of a helicopter, but after the cone dissapeared there were no running lights at all that helicopters have. we were very excited and new this was really unusual especially when we realized it was not a plane or helicopter.
content.summary: Bright, white cone of light. stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking down the street near my home in a south-south east direction. i was looking towards jupiter and the sorounding stars when i noticed the stars looked distorted as though i was looking at them through water. i then noticed a triangular object. the object had 6 round "lights". 1 light at each angle and 1 light on each side. the lights were very dim. the color of the lights was a whitish orange. they seemed more like they were glowing or reflecting light from the ground. the object was moving very smoothly in a straight line. no sound. i could not tell the approximate altitude it was at. if the object was a low altitude, it was probable traveling at 20 - 30 mph. i watched the object for about 10 seconds before it went behind a building. i ran back down the street in the opposite direction to get a look at the object on the other side of the building.I watched it as it moved away in a north east direction. 
  i've been watching the skies for ufo's for about 45 years. i never seen anything like this. even though i was always looking forward to seeing something like this, i found it a bit disturbing. during and after the sighting, i felt a bit shaken up.
content.summary: Saw a triangular shaped ufo with 6 "lights"

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on new circle road going north and between exit 2 (harrodsburg rd.) and exit 5 (versailles rd.) the time was roughly 6:32 give or take a few minutes. i spotted a black hovering object past the tree-line. i tried to look at it as much as i could, but that's pretty hard when you're driving and having to turn. i lost sight of it when i came to the tree line, but i managed to see it a few more times in gaps but was unable to get a very close look. i know it was definitely black, not that high in the air, had no lights on it (at least none that were on), and hovered very smoothly. i kept sight of it until i had to get off my exit 5b. i believe the object was hovering to the east of new circle. 

the object was, as far as i could tell, completely motionless. it was mostly a black blob at first, but it looked like it had parts coming out of it. i know it couldn't have been on a plane unless it was very big and very far away to give the illusion of hovering. it couldn't have been balloons because this object was not wavering or swaying as far as i could tell and definitely seemed like 1 solid object. the only thing i can think of it being would be a helicopter but for some reason i really don't think it was.
content.shape: Blimp,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Driving on the road i saw a black object hovering in the air.

content.detailedDescription:
The day had been very bad for chemtrail spraying. many times the trails were accompanied by low flying helicopters that morning (not military) so my son and i had gone outside to take photos.

this was around 7:45 or so and it was very light out. we have deep blue skies when the mountain winds blow in missoula and it makes for a very clear photo, especially in the morning, even with the trails crisscrossing like they were. 

i first noticed the object because i was focused in on a large jet chemtrail that was in the process of being sprayed directly in front of us. on the camera screen i saw a shadow and took the photo, thinking it was just a part of the spreading chemtrail. 

when i pulled the camera down from the shot, i noticed something zoom off to my right really fast but only saw a deep blue blur at the edge of my vision. 

whatever it was, it streaked off very fast and it left an impression in my vision like when you look at the sun or a light and look away-for a few moments you still see the light. that was what it was like.

we went back into the house, uploaded the pictures we had taken of all the jet activity and were shocked at the photo i had of the object.

jon told me he had been looking up when i was shooting and had seen a large blue object come from the chemtrail and then shoot off towards the mountain. i didn't see anything myself except the round object as i was focusing and the blur and light afterwards.

i didn't know what it was in my shots but we kept them. i've tried to deepen the color and lighten the colors to get a better look at the object
but othetrwise, except for the color and crop, these are untouched.

we've never mentioned it to anyone but i read a story by roger marsh at the honolulu examiner based on a sighting reported at mufon case 19339 (according to his website) that shows an illustration very similar (i believe) to what we photographed back in december 2006. 

the photo has always bothered me and i think maybe someone else may have seen it now. somehow, that makes me feel better. i have a couple more photos of whatever it was.
content.summary: My son and i were photographing chemtrails when i saw an object in my view screen.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i went out on my front porch to smoke a cig, we don't smoke in our home. i was facing outward towards the main road that we live on here in sheldon, vt. i could only see so much of the sky because of the roof of my front porch. between the roof of my porch and the trees across the road from us i only had 3 ft of sky view. (that was from my perspective from my front porch) as we were standing there talking he was facing me and i was facing the road. all of a sudden i just saw this round glowing ball moving quickly then it disappeared beyond the treeline. i said look! 3 times and by the time he had turned around to see what i was seeing it had already disappeared. to me it looked as if it was falling. there was no tracers, no sounds, just the object. i came in my house maybe 1 minute after and my clock said that it was 12:55 am. i immediately got on my laptop and e-mailed a person that i know who works for a paranormal investigating team based out of south burlington, vermont. he emailed me back and said that they were on the road coming back from a reported ufo sighting area and he could not believe that i had seen it from my home because him and his team had seen the samething in the sky from essex, vt. essex is about 30 miles from me. his team were in separte cars one car was ahead of him and was behind him and they all had seen the samething. i am very interested in finding out how many people had actually seen this, or if anyone else reported this to you. it was a great experience i am very anxious to find out what i and others saw. thank you for your time,   danielle benoit, sheldon, vt, 05483 this event occured at 12:50am on sept 20 2009 this form wont except my time.
content.summary: Veiwed it from my front porch it was a glowing green circle or sphere.

content.detailedDescription: My son said he was outside and he saw a light that seemed close in the sky and in was just sitting there then dissappeared about 20 seconds after he first saw it.  i went to the store later that night (around 1:00am) and on my way home for about 5 seconds, a green fireball looked like it was falling to the earth rapidly and then it dissappeared.  about an hour later (seemingly for no reason, there was no inclement weather) every bit of electricity in the neighborhood went out.  we were sitting in complete darkness in our living room for about 20 seconds at 2:00am.
content.summary: Son saw object then 2 hours later saw green streak drop to earth and power went out.

content.detailedDescription:
on sept. 17, 2009 at exactly 11:30 am i went down to the peticodiac river to take pictures, it was a high tide at high noon, rare & good light for photos. i took 40 shots looking southwest & panned to the left & back to the right again, using different zoom levels. because the lcd display is hard to view in strong ambient light i often don't see small objects & this was the case. i loaded them into my pc & discovered the object in two frames out of 47 in total...But, after searching with various levels of magnification, this object appeared in 14 of the 47 frames. i have a good pc with a very good graphics card & application & zoomed these objects in almost to the individual pixel & it maintained a circular shape...I live on the river at the bay of fundy also near the moncton flying club & i'm a pilot...I very familiar with birds & aircraft being in my local pictures & there were some in this series as well, but all of those exposed wings ay high magnification.
    of the 14 images of the object all but two only show that something of circular shape is in the distance & i may have ignored these if not for the one, no. dcc02255 (2), that is obviousely a saucer shaped object at an angle, low on the horizon above a house. the house is across the river & is approximately 1 mile distant. it is very clear & seams to show a shine on the top with a dark shaded bottom. the second, no. dsc02246, is more distant in a quadrant of the sky just south of the first image & appears to have a streak above/behind it, like a shadow on the clouds...Or it could look like a weather balloon...One has to view these two images & come to a professional opinion. the other 12 frames with the object have images of a circular object at various degrees of clarity, some are an obvious circular object where others are just a dot that does not show any wings under magnification & could be a flying insect perhaps...They have a degree of interest however by the coincidence of being part of a series of pictures that do reveal an object.
    all pictures will be made available to you as is any other information i can add.
content.summary: Did not visually witness object but discovered it in photos

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i headed outside to close up the chicken pen as they were all in the coop for the night. i had to take a flashlight out with me as it would be dark inside the coop but it wasn't quite dark outside yet. i closed and locked the door and my husband was standing on the back porch and i looked up and seen a bright triangular shaped object followed by a large military jet. they seemed to only be at an altitude of 2000 ft and were traveling at a very low speed. so slow my husband commented on how are they staying up? we watched them travel directly from south to north and they were directly over top of us and we could see clearly a triangular shape with two lights on the "underbelly" and it also glowed very brightly white. it was followed by the jet approximately 100 ft behind. we could see both as plain as day. we live on top of a hill and had a clear view of it for several minutes, and at the last sight of it it turned and headed more in a north westerly direction.
i hesiated about reporting this event until my mother was told by someone there was a jet reportedly following an "ice ball" ??? this was no ice ball, we could hear the jet plainly but no sound from the larger triangular shaped object in front of it. it was flying, no ice ball can do that! it was seen in northern lower michigan.
content.summary: Ufo followed by a military jet at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: Went outside at 6:30 this morning and saw a extremely large starlike object in the eastern sky over santa fe, it looked pretty far away.  i went back in the house and got binoculars and continued looking, at about 6:40 i saw it blow up into a cloud of light, it started to take on a balloon shape, but then another star (light object) pulled away and seperated from it, alot smaller and stayed stationary in the sky, then a bunch of little lights shot out of the top of it and disappeared.  the cloud slowly deflated and looked like a string of light hanging in the sky until it disappeared.  the smaller ball of light that had pulled away and emergered stayed about 5 minutes longer getting fainter then disappeared. at one point while looking at it with binoculars it looked matallic. they all seemed to stay in the same place in the sky, nothing looked like it fell to the ground and it was completely silent.
content.summary: Went outside at 6:30 am and saw an extremely bright light that looked like a star, i got binoculars and contunued looking, at 6:40 it looked like it exploded into a cloud of light, another light emerged from it from the bottom

content.detailedDescription: While at a friends house last night 4 of us wittnessed a bright light with a cone shaped discharge coming straight down the gradully disapeared and discharge slowly diminished lasted aproximatly 20 seconds we were facing south freeport long island
content.summary: A bright light with cone shaped discharge of gas coming down

content.detailedDescription: I was standing chatting with a friend in newcastle city center (monument area) .We were looking at the que of about 500 people waiting to get books signed outside waterstones, when i noticed what i thought were two balloons blowing across the top of the buildings. but when i moved to get a better look i could see they were not balloons as they did not seem to be solid objects and the way they were moving could not have been achieved by the wind. they were circling each other moving apart and then toghether again and there was nothing between them to cause this. i tried for 10 seconds or so to get a picture but unusually my camera would just not focus properly on the objects. i have not had this problem before so i focused on the roof of a nearby building just to get some kind of shot, before they dissapeared behind the roof in the picture.
content.summary: Noticed what i thought to be two balloons circling each other

content.detailedDescription: We were at an outside dinner party, the sky was clear, no clouds anywhere.At approximatley 7:30pm several of us noticed a bright light in the southern sky, the object/light was located beween saturn and the constellation sagitarius. its altitude was parallel to saturn, and was a little brighter than saturn. i did not notice when it arrived, but about 20 of us noticed that it was generating a cloud or mist just below itself, the mist then crept upwards and enveloped the object, you could still see the object glowing in the mist, then the object slowly got dimmer then vanished, the mist then dissipated. there was no noise. this happened in pittstown new jersey
content.summary: Object made mist/cloud, mist enveloped object, object disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of persistant contrails from my balcony as the sky was criss crossed with them which i thought to be very strange as there were so many. but i did not notice anything at the time of the event i only noticed the object when reviewing my pictures on my pc.
content.summary: Taking picture`s of persistant contrails.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting typing on a laptop at my mothers house as it is in front of the window, i happend to look out and noticed a small rainbow just above the satelite dish that is on the wall opposite i thought this was unusual in it`s self so i took a picture with my phone as this was all i had to hand. then when i viewed the picture to my amazement there was a large glowing orb. which i could not see when looking out of the window.
content.summary: Noticed a small rainbow in clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friend's house as i passed though the park area, i spotted what i thought was a star, i stopped to look at it, the "star" began to move north-east in a slow pace.It stopped then hovered for a minute or so. it suddenly zipped off to the right and i lost sight of it from there. i assume it dissapeared.
content.summary: Walking home spotted a star like object

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were traveling east bound on rt 38, east of la fox rd.  we had just passed the juvenile detention center.  i should note that in this location there is a large field with no towers of any kind between rt 38 and campton hills rd.  so, just in the course of driving i had looked to the left (north) and noticed 3 lights across the field, seemed to be above the subdivision of upper class homes.  now, there was no other traffic on the road at this moment, we were the only vehicle.  so, i figured maybe it was a helicopter really low for some reason, we started to slow down and roll the windows down to see if we could hear it but there was no sound.  in the course of traveling on the road, and moving slower now, the perspective of the object began to change, as to say that the lights appeard to be getting closer to one another.  this is where it seemed odd because that would mean the object is hovering (not moving).  moving at about 20 mph now, the object did not move or change brightness or anything, there were no flashing aviation lights of any kind, the brightness could be compared to street lights from a  mile away.  eventually the lights disappeared as we traveled like we passed the view of something that is facing in the opposite direction.  during these moments we were inquisitive at first but as we realized that we were looking at an unknown object, and being the only vehicle on the road visible to what ever it was, we became a little on edge for as we did not what to be abductees.  no joke, so i stomped on the gas and we continued traveling and never saw it again.  we were both positive we saw something off the ground, it could not have been street lights or house lights, it was to high up.  that area where we saw the object is heavily wooded and saw no other lights except for the objects.
content.summary: Hovering object @ >200' above surface w/ 3 lights in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were traveling east bound on rt 38, east of la fox rd.  we had just passed the juvenile detention center.  i should note that in this location there is a large field with no towers of any kind between rt 38 and campton hills rd.  so, just in the course of driving i had looked to the left (north) and noticed 3 lights across the field, seemed to be above the subdivision of upper class homes.  now, there was no other traffic on the road at this moment, we were the only vehicle.  so, i figured maybe it was a helicopter really low for some reason, we started to slow down and roll the windows down to see if we could hear it but there was no sound.  in the course of traveling on the road, and moving slower now, the perspective of the object began to change, as to say that the lights appeard to be getting closer to one another.  this is where it seemed odd because that would mean the object is hovering (not moving).  moving at about 20 mph now, the object did not move or change brightness or anything, there were no flashing aviation lights of any kind, the brightness could be compared to street lights from a  mile away.  eventually the lights disappeared as we traveled like we passed the view of something that is facing in the opposite direction.  during these moments we were inquisitive at first but as we realized that we were looking at an unknown object, and being the only vehicle on the road visible to what ever it was, we became a little on edge for as we did not what to be abductees.  no joke, so i stomped on the gas and we continued traveling and never saw it again.  we were both positive we saw something off the ground, it could not have been street lights or house lights, it was to high up.  that area where we saw the object is heavily wooded and saw no other lights except for the objects.
content.summary: Hovering object @ >200' above surface w/ 3 lights in triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription:
Please stop the nonsense about the cone of light with fog/mist.  it was a nasa test.  read about it here.  http://www.Nasa.Gov/centers/wallops/care.Html  i guess it goes to show how quick people are to assume ufo before looking into reason. 

this is an excerpt from the nasa article:
the charged aerosol release experiment (care) was conducted by the naval research laboratory and the department of defense space test program using a nasa four-stage black brant xii suborbital sounding rocket. using ground based instruments and the stp/nrl stpsat-1 spacecraft, scientists will study an artificial noctilucent cloud formed by the exhaust particles of the rocket���s fourth stage at about 173 miles altitude.

it was lit up because they needed to take pictures from the ground.  sorry to dash your hopes you saw a ufo.
content.summary: Cone of light....It was a nasa test people, stop posting the nonsense and do research first.

content.detailedDescription: Saw bright round light moving east across the sky. light had a beam shining down from it. moved into a misty cloud, light began to dim and then went out. mist traveled for another 15 to 20 seconds and then evaporated, the light and mist were gone. the odd part is that this was a cloudless, star-filled sky. after the mist dissipated, the stars were visible again. very strange. i was taking trash to the dumpster behind my work. at first i thought helicopter, but then i realized there was no sound at all. i called my wife after the sighting and told her that i just saw something weird in the sky.
content.summary: Large bright light with triangular beam emanating from below.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a private farm just outside of brookeville, pa for a music concert, standing around waiting for the band to begin at 8:00 pm. i was facing the barn (where the music was about to begin), facing due west. my friend tapped me on the shoulder and said "ufo, ufo, ufo!" i turned around (facing due east) to see a very bright point of light, much brighter in magnitude than a star. from this point came a cone shapped beam of light that descended to the ground, much like a fan, but with extremely well defined, sharp edges. once it filled the sky between what would be the ground and the origin, the area appeared to become even brighter, before retracting back to the point of light, leaving a smokey or cloudy sky in its wake. i remember thinking, "it got cloudy" because it had been a clear blue sky all day. as i looked closer at the area from which the beam had emerged, i noticed a shimmering section of the sky (like you would see on a hot day above a long road surface on the horizon), above the cloudy section, and this space began to slowly move from left to right. the entire episode lasted about 9 seconds, no time to even think about grabbinng a camera. it immediately became apparent that others had seen the same thing, so i began to talk to others, confirming my report above. there were at least 50 witnesses to this event. one final note is that as we stared at the sky just seconds after, we noticed a few private planes in in the sky in the general area, so these pilots could have seen the light and reported it to a control tower. it was really amazing to see.
content.summary: Cone shaped beam of light descends from sky

content.detailedDescription: Http://www.Casttv.Com/video/b19kh11/nasa-black-brant-xii-care-mission-video
content.summary: Cone shaped light video identified as nasa black brant xii

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:45-7:50pm this bright cone like shaped appeared to the left of mercury.  it didn't move, just was there.  then at 7:53pm it just disappeared - no warning just gone.
content.summary: Bright light - upside down cone

content.detailedDescription: We saw a huge, bright, star like object in the northeast sky toward santa fe at 6:40 am this morning.  the bright object appeared to be round but when seen through the binoculars looked triangular.  it was 20 times larger than any star or planet we have ever seen in the sky.  we could not determine the distance but seemed very far away. it seemed to be stationery.  after a couple of minutes, from our vantage point, a smaller light separated downward from the larger object with a trail of light visible between the two objects for a brief time.  during the separation, both objects seemed brighter.  after the light diminished between the two objects, they both disappeared toward the northeast.
content.summary: Bright spherical light in northeast sky, 20 times larger than a star

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a private farm just outside of brookeville, pa for a music concert, standing around waiting for the band to begin at 8:00 pm.

i was facing the barn (where the music was about to begin), facing due west. my friend tapped me on the shoulder and said "ufo, ufo, ufo!" i turned around (facing due east) to see a very bright point of light, much brighter in magnitude than a star. from this point came a cone shapped beam of light that descended to the ground, much like a fan, but with extremely well defined, sharp edges. once it filled the sky between what would be the ground and the origin, the area appeared to become even brighter, before retracting back to the point of light, leaving a smokey or cloudy sky in its wake. i remember thinking, "it got cloudy" because it had been a clear blue sky all day. as i looked closer at the area from which the beam had emerged, i noticed a shimmering section of the sky (like you would see on a hot day above a long road surface on the horizon), above the cloudy section, and this space began to slowly move from left to right. 

the entire episode lasted about 9 seconds, no time to even think about grabbinng a camera.  it immediately became apparent that others had seen the same thing, so i began to talk to others, confirming my report above. there were at least 50 witnesses to this event.

one final note is that as we stared at the sky just seconds after, we noticed a few private planes in in the sky in the general area, so these pilots could have seen the light and reported it to a control tower.

it was really amazing to see.
content.summary: Cone shaped beam of light descends from sky

content.detailedDescription:
I know a lot of folks saw this last night. nasa is 'taking' responsibility, claiming that an experimental rocket they fired at 7:46 is the cause. the article i read on cnn is poorly written, and does not describe what i saw, nor does the explanation provided by nasa quite jibe with my knowledge of atmospherics and light behavior (more on that below.)

i was in my front yard, sitting by a small wood fire, enjoying the evening. the sky was clear, with very thin, high cloud 'veins'. the clouds were so thin stars were visible through them. i was watching the sky when i noticed a bright spot appear to the east, approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. in about 8 seconds the light point grew to app. 5x the brightness of jupiter (also visible to the south). at about the ten second mark, a cone of light spread out from beneath the point light. this cone spread quickly, in about 3 seconds the cone, at its widest, was about the width of 6 full moons. it had two darker 'veins' in it, sort of like crepuscular rays, that extended down and out (and slightly to the left (or north) from the light. the point of light faded out after another 8 seconds, and then the cone slowly lost its brilliance and became fuzzy. the whole thing lasted 60 seconds or so. there was no sound and i did not notice any movement to the point light during the sighting (other reports indicate they saw a slight drift to the light.)

perhaps the cnn article i referenced above is just poorly written. it mentions a "series" of lights, but i only saw one. also, according to the article, the sightings were 'from massachusetts to new jersey.' i'm in northern virginia, and some of the reports here in the mufon database are from west virginia, pennsylvania, maryland, and virginia. also, nasa seems to be indicating that this was caused by sunlight reflecting off of high altitude clouds, seeded by this rocket. that does not explain what i witness last evening; if i were to try to explain it using nasas info, i would think that the rocket ignited its stage four booster (the point light) which in turn illuminated the vapor / exhaust particles in the atmosphere. this does not explain the cone appearing after the light was already at almost full brightness, nor does it account for the 'afterglow' of the cone once the point light went out. this event being related to sunlight on high altitude clouds seems (as is intimated in the nasa explanation) is way off: this was not sunlight on clouds.

i am not saying that nasa is full of it, i am just saying the article is poorly written and the facts presented there do not fully explain what i witnessed.

regardless of any explanation, it was an extremely beautiful sight and i am glad others were witness to it.
content.summary: Bright point with emanating cone
